scripts.enketo-core: cd packages/enketo-core && npm i && npm start
scripts.enketo-express: cd packages/enketo-express && docker run --name enketo-redis-main -p 6381:6379 -d redis && docker run --name enketo-redis-cache -p 6382:6379 -d redis && npm i && npm i -g grunt && grunt develop
scripts.form-manager: cd packages/form-manager && npm i && npm start
scripts.wrapper: cd apps/wrapper && npm i && npm start
scripts.concurrent-packages: concurrently "npm run enketo-core" "npm run enketo-express" "npm run form-manager"
scripts.concurrent: npm run docker-cleanup && concurrently "npm run concurrent-packages" "npm run concurrent-applications"
